column3: that's kind of a big     suprise.
i also have a suprise     for you...
and it's not as pleasant      as your's.
do you think this is      funny?
you aren't supposed to        do this you know?
you aren't even trying        to hide it anymore
you don't like playing     fair huh?
you are not going to        have your turn ever
we can stand here until   the end of time too
i can't kill you and you     can't kill me
so why are you still       here?
if you think i'll let you       do THAT trick again
do you really not have    ANYTHING better to do?
you want to just stay      here and do nothing?
i do it all the time
you keep waiting until i     say something
if i stop talking you will     eventually get bored
i wouldn't let you do         that trick on me again
